review: I'm a simple man. If a zombie survival game performs better pc-wise than DayZ, I give thumbs up.

Story of my life.1) Win $3333 on CS:GO Lounge.2) Buy your dream knife.3) Constantly weapon switch and inspect it, to make other people Kreygasm.4) Watch Sodapoppin win $333333 and feel inspired.5) Bet it all on CS:GO Jackpot.6) Watch it go down the drain.7) Play CS:GO and cry to all your silver friends.8) Start again.I would r8 8/8 m8 whilst fingering my prost8.♥♥♥♥ ♥♥♥♥♥...♥♥♥♥♥
